metadata.description: The unique guid for this Analytics Rule

properties.displayName: [WASOC-Intelligence] Phishing email potentially delivered to user mailbox
properties.description:
phishing-001
The rules detect emails that matched Indicator of Compromise (IOC) from WASOC Threat Intelligence feed. The email was not blocked and could have been potentially in the user's inbox.
properties.query:
//WASOC-Intelligence phishing-001
let dt_lookBack = 1h; //email-events lookback period
let ioc_lookBack = 14d; //Threat Intel lookback period
let EmailEvents_ = workspace("23f5b860-1ab0-4876-930c-4a1bda91781a").EmailEvents 
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(dt_lookBack) and isnotempty(SenderMailFromAddress) and  DeliveryAction !has "Blocked" and SenderMailFromAddress <> "<>"
| where EmailDirection == "Inbound"
| extend RecipientEmailAddress = tolower(RecipientEmailAddress)
| project TimeGenerated, DeliveryAction, DeliveryLocation, EmailDirection, NetworkMessageId, RecipientEmailAddress, SenderMailFromAddress, SenderFromAddress, SenderMailFromDomain, SenderIPv4, Subject, To
| project-rename  EmailEvents_TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated
;
let TI = ThreatIntelIndicators
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(ioc_lookBack)
//Use only WASOC-Government-ISAC feed
| where SourceSystem == "WASOC-Government-ISAC" and Tags contains "phishing"
| extend IndicatorType = replace(@"\[|\]|\""", "", tostring(split(ObservableKey, ":", 0)))
| where IndicatorType == "email-addr"
| extend EmailSenderAddress = ObservableValue
| extend EmailSourceDomain = substring(EmailSenderAddress, indexof(EmailSenderAddress, "@") + 1, strlen(EmailSenderAddress) - indexof(EmailSenderAddress, "@") - 1)
| extend TrafficLightProtocolLevel = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalFields).TLPLevel)
| extend TI_EmailAddress = tolower(EmailSenderAddress)
| summarize LatestIndicatorTime = arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Id, ObservableValue
| where IsActive and (ValidUntil > now() or isempty(ValidUntil));
union isfuzzy=true
(EmailEvents_ // Join based on SenderMailFromAddress
| join kind=inner
(
TI
) on $left.SenderMailFromAddress == $right.ObservableValue),
(EmailEvents_ // Join based on SenderFromAddress
| join kind=inner
(
TI
) on $left.SenderFromAddress == $right.ObservableValue)
| where EmailEvents_TimeGenerated < ValidUntil
| extend Description = tostring(parse_json(Data).description)
| extend ActivityGroupNames = extract("ActivityGroup:([^,]+)", 1, tostring(parse_json(Data).labels))
| project EmailEvents_TimeGenerated, Description, Id, ValidUntil, Confidence, SenderMailFromDomain, RecipientEmailAddress, SenderMailFromAddress,SenderFromAddress, Subject, Type, ObservableValue, TrafficLightProtocolLevel, DeliveryAction, DeliveryLocation, EmailDirection, NetworkMessageId
| extend Name = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, '@', 0)[0]), UPNSuffix = tostring(split(RecipientEmailAddress, '@', 1)[0])
| extend timestamp = EmailEvents_TimeGenerated

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: [WASOC-Intelligence] Phishing email potentially delivered to user's mailbox, sent by {{ObservableValue}}
